Name: Satan's Kittens
Details: A member of Tortuga City's ruling council, the Satan's Kittens are led by Laura 'Kitten' Murray and were one of Paula Trevaline's main allies in the deposition of the former ruler of the Tortuga Dominions, Lord Kalvin Bar-Dyness. The Kittens are known for avoiding fighting outside their own terms, and for their infamous use of fire as a terror weapon against both civilian and military targets.
